2. Connect hive server2 repetitively in a while true loop.

fields.summary: Hive server2 jdbc driver connection leak with namenode

comments.body: Got the same issue on CDH5. It seems that when the open files limit is set to low for hive and these connections are not closed it will start throwing this error.
We are facing same issue in production. We are using CDH4.4 with Apache Hive 0.12. Is there a workaround for this issue other than restarting hiveserver2?
